sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { TitleStrategy } from '@angular/router'; import { Drink } from 'src/app/_core/models/drink.model'; import { ApiService } from 'src/app/_core/services'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { drinks: Drink[] = []; searchedDrink:string = ''; constructor(private service: ApiService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.setAllDrinks(); } async setAllDrinks() { await this.service.getAllDrinks().then((res: any) => { this.drinks = res;} ).catch((e:any )=> console.log(e)); } async setSearchedDrinks() { await this.service.getSearchedDrinks(this.searchedDrink).then((res: any) => { this.drinks = res;} ).catch((e:any )=> console.log(e)); } clearSearch() { this.searchedDrink = ''; this.setAllDrinks() } }
